data.eml:eml: Five new species of the genus Nannopus (Copepoda: Harpacticoida: Nannopodidae) from intertidal mudflats of the Korean West Coast (Yellow Sea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vakati, Vinod, Lee Wonchoel (2017): Five new species of the genus Nannopus (Copepoda: Harpacticoida: Nannopodidae) from intertidal mudflats of the Korean West Coast (Yellow Sea). Zootaxa 4360 (1): 1-66, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4360.1.1
